channel.title: Server freeze when spawn items
channel.description: ok i got this client call Orical-X and when i spawn item it work fine but when i spawn d claw it freeze and i cant log back in my account, does anyone know how to fix that

item.title: Server freeze when spawn items
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

What have you done? Can you be a bit more detailed?

Did you add the item serverside in your item.cfg file?

Are you sure you added the right models and ints for the dragon claws and does the item ID for those claws match the server side id for the claws?

If it still freezes up, it is probably your ints calling upon a model that doesn’t exist. It might even be the fact that your models for the d claws are corrupt or just not working.

Read full topic

item.title: Server freeze when spawn items
item.dc:creator: @xxruneryxx xxruneryxx
item.description:
@xxruneryxx wrote:

it’s still freeze up

Read full topic

item.title: Server freeze when spawn items
item.dc:creator: @No_Life2 No Life
item.description:
@No_Life2 wrote:

It sounds like a 317 or 474.

Whenever you spawn a null item (an item that does not exist in the client that you’re using) your client will refuse to load it on your screen. Unless it’s an item with an ID # in range with the rest of the normal items, therefore it just shows up as a “null” item.

To fix this, add in the d claw models/ints into your client with the same ID as you are trying to spawn them with. Make sure this ID matches with the server-side ID, otherwise the d claws will not have any stats.

Read full topic

item.title: Server freeze when spawn items
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

Remember you have to use their client. Otherwise there’s just a problem with the d claw.

Read full topic
